hero.subtitle: We Care Your Baby
hero.title: The Best Play Area
hero.description: Providing a safe, nurturing environment where your children can learn, play, and grow. Our experienced staff creates engaging activities that promote development and creativity.

about.title: Welcome to Kindergarten
about.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.
about.videoTitle: A Place to Learn and Grow
about.videoDescription: Our kindergarten provides a nurturing and stimulating environment where children can explore, create, and grow into confident individuals. We focus on play-based learning and holistic development to prepare them for a bright future.

sportActivities.title: Sport Activities
sportActivities.description: Engaging physical activities that promote healthy development and teamwork skills.

highlySecured.title: Highly Secured
highlySecured.description: Complete safety measures and secure environment for your peace of mind.

outdoorGames.title: Outdoor Games
outdoorGames.description: Fun outdoor activities that encourage exploration and connection with nature.

services.title: Our Amazing
services.description: Discover our comprehensive range of educational and developmental programs designed to nurture your child's growth in a fun and engaging environment.

educational.title: Educational Programs
educational.content: Comprehensive learning programs designed to develop cognitive skills, creativity, and critical thinking through interactive activities and play-based learning methods.

arts.title: Creative Arts & Crafts
arts.content: Hands-on artistic activities that encourage self-expression, fine motor skill development, and imagination through painting, drawing, sculpting, and various craft projects.

physical.title: Physical Activities
physical.content: Fun physical exercises and sports activities that promote healthy development, coordination, teamwork, and social skills in a safe outdoor environment.

science.title: Science Discovery
science.content: Age-appropriate science experiments and discovery activities that spark curiosity, encourage exploration, and introduce basic scientific concepts through hands-on learning.

programs.title: What We Offer For
programs.description: Discover our comprehensive range of educational programs and activities designed to nurture your child's growth, creativity, and development in a fun and engaging environment.
programs.specialDescription: Unique activities that make learning extra special and memorable

earlyLearning.title: Early Learning
earlyLearning.description: Comprehensive educational programs designed to build foundational skills in reading, writing, and mathematics.

creativeArts.title: Creative Arts
creativeArts.description: Unleash your child's creativity through painting, drawing, crafts, and various artistic expressions.

musicDance.title: Music & Dance
musicDance.description: Musical education and dance classes that enhance rhythm, coordination, and self-expression.

physicalEducation.title: Physical Education
physicalEducation.description: Fun physical activities and sports that promote healthy lifestyle and teamwork skills.

languageDevelopment.title: Language Development
languageDevelopment.description: Multilingual programs that enhance communication skills and cultural awareness.

stemLearning.title: STEM Learning
stemLearning.description: Science, technology, engineering, and math activities that spark curiosity and innovation.

dramaClub.title: Drama Club
dramaClub.description: Build confidence through storytelling and performance

places.title: Number of daycare places
places.description: Discover our hosting capacities and our team dedicated to the development of your children in a secure and caring environment.

testimonials.title: Parent Testimonials
testimonials.description: Discover what our parents think about our daycare and the services we offer to their children.

items.gregory: A beautiful daycare perfect for my children! I recommend it to everyone
items.sarah: A very safe daycare for my child, he always has fun there. A trustworthy team!
items.belba: My son attended the Saint Michel Academy daycare for 4 years until he left for kindergarten this year. We were very satisfied with the colossal work that the educators did and the good atmosphere that exists between parents and staff
